item.title: Ruby operators
item.description: References https://www.tutorialspoint.com/ruby/ruby%5Foperators.htm double pipe ||= 1 2 3 def repos @repos ||= init_repos end ||= behaves like a || a = b i.e. it only assigns when a is not truthy.
